titles.title: New York Fair Fishing Act of 2012
To amend the Magnuson-Stevens Fishery Conservation and Management Act to add New York to the New England Fishery Management Council, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.

bill.summary: 6/1/2012--Introduced. New York Fair Fishing Act of 2012 - Amends the Magnuson-Stevens Fishery Conservation and Management Act to add the state of New York as a member of the New England Fishery Management Council.
